name: Futsumashi na Yome desu ga.
nutshell: One day, Hirazono Satsuki, while walking home from work, finds a girl in a garbage dump. He ends up taking her home and she introduces herself as Riene, an exorcist. She is on a quest to find somebody who took care of her before, a girl named Satsuki. Could he be the same Satsuki?

name: Xyrin Empire
nutshell:
The legendary tale of the Xyrin Empire is not about its struggles... or the tempest of another world or some cultivation myth. This is a super-serious, super-hard sci-fi manhua about saving the world.
Take what I’m saying seriously...
Not.
Okay, this is just a funny story about a deceptive human emperor, bringing his bunch of slippery alien leaders to have fun saving the world every day.
Chen Jun is an unmotivated otaku who turns into the Emperor of an ancient intergalactic magic sci-fi empire. With the aura of a stay-at-home dad, he is nothing but a middle-aged man who adopts a group of lolis... and an army of freeloading aliens that came out of nowhere. Er, what?
Ahem. Really though, this is a super-serious story... a super-mega-ultra-serious sci-fi story.
For the Empire!

name: Pharaoh
nutshell: Gag manga about the everyday life of an Egyptian pharaoh discovered at a dig site in modern Japan.

name: Adult na Kaihatsu Shitsu
nutshell: Yuuki's boyfriend Eiichi hits him, leeches off of him, and even whores him out to some of the worst people. But Yuuki still says that he loves Eiichi and refuses to leave him.

name: The Time Between Dog and Wolf
nutshell:
"Until I learned what this time meant… it had always been just a dark time for me."
Painter Han Kiyo who had been living a life of poverty was commissioned by an anonymous person on social media to draw some pictures. However, he became a murder suspect because the paintings he did portrayed vivid murder scenes. On top of that, due to a staff’s error, Kiyo was sent to an alpha prison, instead of an omega one.
Raw:

Ridibooks
MrBlue
Bomtoon
Lezhin

name: Meikyuu Kingdom: Damu Tokushu Butai SAS no Ossan no Isekai Dungeon Survival Manual
nutshell: After being transported to another world, one man's mission is to rebuild a kingdom. He has a very particular set of skills and he's ready to face any obstacle because...who dares, wins! Monster, dungeon, and war stand no chance against the special forces!

name: Bad Guy and Cutie Police
nutshell: When the rookie and cute cop falls prey to this bad and perverted boy things will not work out for her.

name: Yami Maid ga Shihai suru!
nutshell:
Natsume Hilbright, a girl who has just lost her mother.
Surrounded by her loving father and friends, she misses celebrating her birthday without her mother.
Meanwhile, she happens to meet Jupiter, a boy who claims to be the Prince of the Demon World, and a beautiful girl named Glance, who is said to be his maid.

name: Master's Secret Baby
nutshell:
A young Aryan wakes up in a hotel room and sees a man lying on top of her, but all she can remember is having a drink with her sister. Luckily she manages to escape from more terror, but still ends up broke. She passes out after giving birth, and when she wakes up her stepsister and stepmother can no longer be found in the hospital…
Five years later, she moves to Ningguo as an exchange med student, and with her is her 5 year old son who walks into another kid with identical appearance.

name: Mob Psycho 100 Anthology
nutshell: A series of short stories set within the Mob Psycho 100 universe, all done by other authors.

name: Doyou Wide Club e Youkoso
nutshell: Madam Misa dies mysteriously at the Saturday Night Club. Soon after her death, her young handsome and broke host Hideo opens a similar looking "Host" Club of his own. Where did the money come from? Did Hideo have something to do with Madam Misa's death?

name: Seasons' Cafe
nutshell:
On Jeju Island is a café called ‘Seasons’ Café’. While working at the cafe, a questionable series of events comes to Yoon Yeonghyun.
Even though he’s too jaded to care about the café, a miracle happened and a savior appeared. Although, there’s just one problem… It’s the exact guy who Yeonghyun dumped and ran off on in the past…!
Between both the lack of customers and the breakup, will Yeonghyun be able to manage work and love?

name: Sakigake!! Otokojuku
nutshell: Otokojuku - a private school for juvenile delinquents that were previously expelled from normal schools. At this school, Japanese chivalry is taught through feudal and military fundamentals. Similar to an action film, the classes are overwhelmed by violence. Only those who survive it become true men.

name: Hello, Green Days
nutshell: Mikage, a graduate student in the Department of Botany, is shy and timid when it comes to love. One day, Mikage decides to become roommates with his financially challenged junior classmen, Nanahoshi. But, suddenly one spring day Mikage is confessed to by Nanahoshi – whose sweet personality differs from his scary appearance. For the first time in his life, Mikage is in a relationship, but he struggles to understand how to become a loving boyfriend.

name: Scrap Circus
nutshell: Secret agent from the government meets John Mills, a 12 years old boy who can create anything.

name: Seaside Town Diary
nutshell:
A letter comes to the three Kohda sisters in Kamakura bringing the news of their father's death,
which they hadn't seen since he divorced and left home 15 years ago.
Despite feeling indifferent about their father, Yoshino, the middle of the three, and Chika, the youngest,
go to Yamagata to attend his funeral on oldest sister Sachi's request. There they meet Suzu, their young and reliable half sister.


Won the 2013 Manga Taisho Award
Won the Japan Media Arts Festival Awards Excellence Prize for Manga in 2007

name: Nagi no Asukara
nutshell:
A story between the Sea and the Earth. Childhood friends Hikari and Manaka, who live in the sea, together with their friends Kaname and Chisaki, are forced to attend school on land after their own undersea school is closed. But due to a special encounter, their lives gain a new twist.
Wikipedia

Arabic
Armenian
Chinese (Classical)
Chinese (Traditional)
English
French
Indonesian
Italian
Japanese
Korean
Portuguese
Russian
Spanish
Thai
Turkish

name: Angolmois - Genkou Kassenki
nutshell:
In the 13th century, the Mongolian Empire rapidly expands across the globe. Later historians who studied the prophecies of Nostradamus would say that Mongolia was the birthplace of the "Great King of Terror," Angolmois. And at last, the force of the Mongolian Empire would turn their attention toward Japan… 1274: The Bun'ei Invasion. The exiled samurai Jinzaburou Kuchii is in Kamakura when he finds himself face to face with this invasion.
This story is a fresh look at the great battle that rocked all of medieval Japan: the Mongol Invasion. It shows how the people of Tsushima panicked, struggled, and eventually rose up against the overwhelming forces of their enemy.

Links:

Anime on ANN

Official Korean

name: Seeing Double
nutshell: Ohn can’t stand men, and he’s determined to stay away from them at all costs. Little does he know that the shy, soft-spoken Seo-woo is crushing on him hard. So hard, in fact, that he’s recruited his more confident twin brother, Jae-woo, to act as his double and approach Ohn. But as Jae-woo starts putting a little too much of his own heart into the act, the line between who’s courting Ohn gets blurred. Will the brothers break through Ohn’s hatred of men? And if so, which twin will be the one to win Ohn’s heart?

name: Ouchi e Kaerou: Neko Mimi Omegaverse
nutshell: Shiina and Aoi are a romantic Alpha and Omega couple who live happily together with their little son, Noel. Protected and sheltered by his parents, Noel is unaware that his family is different from any other until he one day accompanies Shiina to work and notices something strange. Why is it that he and Aoi are the only ones with cat ears?

name: Two Pawns
nutshell: Kaede Yukimura is a gorgeous girl who has been challenging every person in her class to a shogi bout. If you win against her, she will confess to you in front of the whole school. As more and more classmates lose against her, the reason behind her bet begins to slowly unravel…

name: Kimi no Tame ni Sekai wa Aru
nutshell:
A collection of oneshots.

The World Exists for You
あらしが来たりて
Friday Night Cinema
Secret Closet
Cast a Spell
Jewel of You

name: Kowagari Kimi ni Kisu no Ame
nutshell:
Kanato was approaching 30 with zero experience of love. Having met his younger partner Mirai unexpectedly, they pursue a long-distance relationship between Tokyo and Osaka. They try their best to use any spare time for secret trysts and , it’s blissful beyond his wildest hopes… but Kanato is keeping a secret from Mirai.
And Mirai ,who treasures Kanato more than anyone else, sees sadness in his eyes. Although they’re supposed to be adults, they can’t help but get swept away… although they are supposed to be adults, they can be awkward too… An earnest love story between cute adults.

name: Iincho.
nutshell:
The first year middle school Student Council Chairpersons (iincho) come from different elementary schools and different backgrounds. These six cute, glasses-wearing middle school girls often fight, but they have a common enemy in the sexual-harassing Student Council President. Will they be able to do their job without being distracted by infighting or thwarted by the controlling Student Council President?
Wikipedia

name: Mr. Dior
nutshell: Seven years into their marriage, one of two CEOs gets into a car accident, and thus begins the real-life story of a handsome CEO and his nut job.

name: Flying Planet
nutshell:
Spanish: ¿Que trucos puede usar el perfecto rico de segunda generacion para recuperar el amor de su antiguo superior? Presencia este magico amor que es como los fuegos artificiales
France:
|| Comment un homme riche et parfait peut-il courir après son misérable premier amour ? L'histoire de cet amour féerique, comme un feu d'artifice ! Si chaque relation doit être entretenue, qu'est notre amour ? Le mien est un feu d'artifice. C'est court ? Non, c'est extraordinaire !
En tant qu'incroyable et riche jeune chef d'une grande famille, les femmes et le mariage sont pour lui de vulgaires jeux. Mais aussi infaillible soit-il, il a en fait été abandonné dans sa vie universitaire, par un garçon dont le père est mort jeune. En se rencontrant une nouvelle fois, il décide de ne pas le laisser une seconde fois. ||

name: Guilty Axe
nutshell: The moment you turn a blind eye on injustice, you will definitely become a miserable person”. A boy named Dantae died after trying to save his friend, and at the same time a monster called “Sin” appeared. An option was given to Dantae, who thought that he had died. Are you going to heaven or kill the sins and save other people. This is Dantae’s awful punishment action fantasy.

name: Senpai Amasugiru H
nutshell:
This is a lovely manga anthology about love and sex, plus a bit of humor for female readers. It features all the stories of female characters falling love with her senior students. Includes six works from six authors:


Zakuro no Mi (w)o Abaite (Opening the Pomegranate Fruit) by SHINJO Mayu
Kotoko, a young lady with pride and posture was sold to the Tokuda family as the payment to her father's debt. She was ravished by Takahiro Tokuda, her newly engaged fiancee, who would become the ultimate heir to the noble Tokuda family and also would have complete controll over her. What will be the romance of these two?


Sexy Shiyouyo! (Let's Do Sexy!) by KOUSAKA Yuuka


Junai Egoist (Pure Love Egoist) by AYUKAWA Mio


Netsuai Byoutou (Love Fever Hospital Ward) by MURATA Yuka


Wagamama na Kuchibiru by KURUMATANI Haruko
Yuu gets a job acting in a commercial with popular idol star Kano Itsuki. When Yuu works up her courage to introduce herself, he kisses her! What does she do but punch him.


Double Face - Akogare no Senpaihen (Double Face - Senior Student Version) by UCHUUDA Kai

name: Hitoyo Hitoyoni Hitomigoro.
nutshell:
It would be so much easier if I could just be myself, but why can't I do that?
A woman in her 30s who is perfect on the outside but messy on the inside.
A young girl who falls in love.
The handsome boss who is crazy about love.
A self-conscious female office worker who loves to improve herself.
The natural boy who can't get a sense of distance from people.
Peeking into the love lives of these clumsy humans, the pets think: "Human love is so fragile. Human love is so stubborn."

name: Message
nutshell: Just as she’s about to be married to the “perfect husband”, a string of disturbing events starts to haunt Shiori’s life.
